description:
We can almost be certain that Ayanna Pressley would have a problem if someone complained about the skin color of Biden's cabinet if it was a race she actually liked. So while having a problem with a cabinet being too white is equally as racist and cringe as having a problem with it being too Black, Pressley is not smart enough to realize that, as she becomes more racist by the day.

Ayanna Pressley claimed that the “Trump cabinet is on track to be the whitest cabinet in history,” and it’s unclear why she has to make everything about race.


Ayanna Pressley: The Trump administration cabinet is too white. pic.twitter.com/eex0ON7XmF
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom)
title: Ayanna Pressley Claims The “Trump Cabinet Is On Track To Be The Whitest Cabinet In History”

description:
Someone thought it would be a good idea for Jamaal Bowman and Cori Bush to have their show and we can almost be certain that their podcast career will be even shorter than their political career. Nonetheless, they sat down for their first episode last week to discuss things they don’t understand.

During that episode, Bush admitted that the Dems were planning on passing a $10 trillion climate bill as part of their pathetic effort to control the direction of the wind.

Wow
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) March 25, 2025
title: Ex-Members of Congress admit their scheme for a climate bill that would have cost TRILLIONS if Kamala won

description:
While the left claims the American people want exactly what they want, that could not be further from the truth. And although these people don’t like this little thing called “reality,” they really need to check themselves before they further wreck themselves.

Even though polling almost always under-reports Trump’s popularity, CNN’s Harry Enten claims he continues to beat everyone's expectations, as many on the left refuse to admit who the unpopular party is.

Oh? I was reliably told that everyone who voted for Trump was regretting it 🙄 https://t.co/4EtcgBCi5t
— Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY) March 25, 2025
title: CNN’s pollster drops a "reality check" on Donald Trump's popularity that Dems and his CNN colleagues are gonna HATE

description:
It’s unclear why no one has told Jasmine Crockett that the best thing she can do for her political career is keep her mouth shut, but for some reason, people keep asking her to speak, and she continues to yap like her life depends on it.

So, while the left gives her a pass for saying things they would otherwise deem politically incorrect, she’s out there mocking a disabled man as if that’s the compassionate thing to do.

Crockett spoke at a pro-LGBTQ benefit dinner over the weekend and decided the best thing to do was mock Texas Gov. Greg Abbott, who is in a wheelchair, by calling him “Governor Hot Wheels.”

"So we out in these hot ass streets with the hot wheels governor who a hot ass mess"

Profound pic.twitter.com/
title: Jasmine Crockett mocks a GOP governor for being disabled while the Human Rights Campaign laughs

description:
According to Joy Behar, Trump has had far too many “glitches.” And even though he was democratically elected in the most undemocratic election in American history, the ladies on “The View” have set standards that have nothing to do with federal law. This is why they are now calling for Democrats to remove Trump from office, whether or not that’s what the people want.

Calling for a coup?
Joy Behar demands Democrats get rid of Trump and remove him from office immediately:
"This guy has to go! I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It's done! Come on, Chuck Schumer and these Democrats - "
To Republicans, she proclaims: "You people need to look in a the m
title: Is Joy Behar calling for a coup? Because it sounds like she's calling for a coup...

description:
Today’s show breaks down the truth about AIPAC and what you need to know.

According to its website, “AIPAC brings together Democrats and Republicans to advance our shared mission. Building bipartisan support for the U.S.-Israel relationship is an American value we are proud to champion.”

“I hope Israel wipes Hamas off the face of the earth,” Crowder said. “I do have a problem with AIPAC as an organization. I dislike AIPAC for the same reason I dislike ActBlue.”
title: Watch: What they don't want you to know about AIPAC

description:
Uh-oh, Trump admin’s accidental group chat leaked with war plans, are we headed into another war or is this all blown out of proportion? The truth about AIPAC and what you ought to know, shocker (not) Jon Stewart whines about Trump and supposed “hypocrisy” and MUCH MORE!

CAIN VELASQUEZ

  • Ex-UFC fighter Cain Velasquez sentenced to 5 years in prison for 2022 shooting
title: Sources: "Top Secret" War Texts Exposed & The AIPAC Question Addressed

description:
The Trump White House is working towards returning everything to normal before the People Who Controlled Joe Biden got a whole lot of official documents, and Donald Trump criticizes the people who criticize him first. Because of these things, Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) claim Trump and the GOP are violating your free speech rights. Expect your miserable progressive friend to take a break from sharing memes about Teslas and celebrating people being murdered to be passing around this Jon Stewart clip.

"These guys don't give a f**k about free speech, they care about THEIR speech." Jon Stewart calls BS on the GOP's free speech crusade pic.twitter.com/2VSL4EcHKQ
— The Daily Show (@TheDailyShow)
title: Jon Stewart attempts bizarro claims that Trump and the GOP OPPOSE free speech, but facts get in the way

description:
The internet over the past few years has shown a ton of shoplifters waltzing out the door since stealing is legal-ish in America. On the rare instance a store employee so much as increases the bass in their voice, they get fired. Compare that to Finland, where a smokeshow of a store clerk dragged a thief back into the store. After blasting them with pepper spray.

This video is working it's way around X-Twitter. It's from 2015. HOWEVER, there is a key point to be made. You know how we at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website are fond of saying "Pay Attention, America" to Europe because their socialist policies
title: Smokeshow goes viral showing proper technique in how to wreck shoplifters (it includes pepper spraying them)
